scripts.dev: pnpm -C packages/contracts dev & pnpm -C apps/api dev & pnpm -C apps/fe dev
scripts.build: pnpm -C packages/contracts build && pnpm -C apps/api build --if-present && pnpm -C apps/fe build --if-present
scripts.typecheck: pnpm -C packages/contracts typecheck && pnpm -C apps/api typecheck --if-present && pnpm -C apps/fe typecheck --if-present
scripts.lint: pnpm -C apps/api lint --if-present && pnpm -C apps/fe lint --if-present
